title: Hire a builder.
tutorialText: Builders will automatically build roads, walls, and other projects for you, using the resources stored at your base.

title: Hire a harvester.
tutorialText: Harvesters will automatically seek out resource nodes and bring their products back to the base.

title: Hire a merchant.
tutorialText: Merchants will automatically gather resources and sell them at a market stall.

title: Purchase a worn pickaxe.
tutorialText: The worn pickaxe allows your units to harvest from stone, copper and tin mines.

title: Build an oak oven.
tutorialText: With ovens, you can produce food for your workers. As worker hunger increases, their ability to work decreases, and they will eventually starve.

title: Build a cracked forge.
tutorialText: With forges, you can convert ores into ingots, which can be used to purchase further upgrades.

title: Upgrade a building.
tutorialText: Upgraded buildings give you access to higher-tier resources, such as iron ingots.
